description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. The story revolves around the player robot joining the Floating Point Faction and their primary goal of defeating the Overclockers, a group of robots addicted to high clock speeds.  The player traverses through various open world environments in an effort to complete quests, improve their skills and eventually battle the leader of the Overclockers, Lord Turbo.
